price: ߣߌ߫ ‹ ߛߊ߬ߓߊ߮ › ߘߏ߲߬ ߞߍ߫ ߘߊ߫ ߡߊ߬ߛߐ߬ߛߐ߬ߟߌ߬ߟߊ߫ ߝߟߌ߬ߓߊ߰ߒߕߋ ߟߎ߬ ߘߏ߫ ߘߌ߫
arabic: وَأَمَّآ إِن كَانَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُكَذِّبِينَ ٱلضَّآلِّينَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wa-ammā in kāna mina al-mukadhibīna al-ḍālīna
